column2: Businesses that falls under the marine & offshore and process sectors will be required to submit details of the employees/workers (https://foodservices.gobusiness.gov.sg/exemptions/login).

Retail establishments and lifestyle-related services are to comply with the following: a. Social gatherings of up to 2 persons will be allowed.
b. The occupancy limit for malls and large standalone stores will be one person per 16 sqm of Gross Floor Area (GFA).
c. The operating capacity of Commercial Family Entertainment Centres must be kept to a maximum of one person per 16 sqm of usable space or25% operating capacity, whichever is lower.
Beauty services and/or activities that require customers to remove their masks must cease
